attributes.action: Stop the extradition of Gary McKinnon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The request by the US to extradite Gary McKinnon is unjust and badly thought out. Anyone that knows anything about ASD and specifically Aspergers will know that Gary would not have understood the consequences of his actions. Gary is undoubteldy an intelligent person and very literate with IT which, surprise surprise is another solid indication of Aspergers. 

Mr Brown, step in and represent us and Gary. Perspective and common sense is everything.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
